column4: This pizza is topped with a blend of four different types of cheese, such as mozzarella, gorgonzola, parmesan, and provolone. It's a great option for cheese lovers
A classic pizza topped with tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, fresh basil, and olive oil. It's simple yet delicious.
This pizza is topped with pepperoni slices, mozzarella cheese, and tomato sauce. It's a popular choice for those who enjoy a bit of spice.
Topped with ham, pineapple, and mozzarella cheese. The combination of sweet and savory flavors makes it unique.
Typically features barbecue sauce, chicken, red onions, and mozzarella cheese. It has a sweet and smoky flavor profile.
Loaded with an assortment of vegetables, such as bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, olives, and tomatoes. It's a healthy and flavorful option.
Topped with prosciutto, arugula, shaved Parmesan cheese, and a drizzle of balsamic glaze. It offers a combination of salty and fresh flavors.
